  • havoc.autoval.tests.sg_qual.sg_qual

Source code for havoc.autoval.tests.sg_qual.sg_qual

from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals

from havoc.autoval.lib.test_base import TestBase
from havoc.autoval.lib.test_utils.sg_utils import SgUtils



[docs]class SgQual(TestBase):

[docs]    def __init__(self):
        super(SgQual, self).__init__()
        self.log_info(self.test_control)



[docs]    def setup(self):
        super(SgQual, self).setup()
        self.sgutils = SgUtils()

        self.sg_devices = self.sgutils.list_scsi_devices(self.host)
        #Validate if the list is not empty
        self.validate_non_empty_list(self.sg_devices, 'SG devices found')



[docs]    def execute(self):
        self.log_info("Test to run SG commands to check for conformance")
        for device in self.sg_devices:
            sg_device = device['sg_device']
            sg_device = "/dev/%s" % sg_device
            #Validate exit code only for the below 11 SG commands
            self.sgutils.validate_sdparm_command_sense(self.host, sg_device)
            self.sgutils.validate_sdparm_command_ready(self.host, sg_device)
            self.sgutils.validate_sdparm_command_capacity(self.host, sg_device)
            self.sgutils.validate_sdparm_inquiry(self.host, sg_device)
            self.sgutils.validate_sdparm_all(self.host, sg_device)
            self.sgutils.validate_sg_readcap(self.host, sg_device)
            self.sgutils.validate_sg_inq(self.host, sg_device)
            self.sgutils.validate_sg_luns(self.host, sg_device)
            self.sgutils.validate_sg_test_rwbuf(self.host, sg_device)
            self.sgutils.validate_sg_verify(self.host, sg_device)
            self.sgutils.validate_sg_turs(self.host, sg_device)

            #Validate the output format using regex for the below 7 SG commands
            self.sgutils.validate_sg_readcap_output(self.host, sg_device)
            self.sgutils.validate_sg_inq_output(self.host, sg_device)
            self.sgutils.validate_sdparm_command_capacity_output(self.host, sg_device)
            self.sgutils.validate_sdparm_command_ready_output(self.host, sg_device)
            self.sgutils.validate_sg_test_rwbuf_output(self.host, sg_device)
            self.sgutils.validate_sg_verify_output(self.host, sg_device)
            self.sgutils.validate_sg_turs_output(self.host, sg_device)




[docs]def main():
    test = SgQual()
    test.lifecycle()



if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
